meanings.definition: A skirt worn under another skirt or dress for added fullness or warmth.
meanings.sent1: She wore an underskirt under her dress to make it look fuller.
meanings.sent2: The underskirt peeked out from under her long gown.
meanings.sent3: The underskirt decided to take a nap under the fancy dress.
meanings.sent4: Her underskirt was like a secret layer, giving her outfit a magical touch.
meanings.sent5: The underskirt rustled softly as she walked, creating a cozy feeling.
